==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ひん|にゅう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ひんにゅう}} compound {{m|zh|貧乳|tr=bin nyu<sup>X</sup>|lit=poor, impoverished + breasts}}.

Alternatively, may have been coined in Japan of {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived elements as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひんにゅう|貧|tr1=hin|t1=poor, impoverished|乳|tr2=nyū|t2=breasts}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ひんにゅう}}

===Noun===

# [[small]] [[breast]]s; someone who is [[flat-chested]]
